tool.name: bam2bigwig
tool.description: Convert bam files to bigwig files
tool.command: bash -c "if ! [ -f ${input_bam}.bai ] ; then ln -s $input_bai ${input_bam}.bai ; bai=1 ; fi ; if [ $is.norm == 'yes' ]; then normalize='--normalizeUsingRPKM' ; fi ; bamCoverage -b $input_bam --binSize ${bsize} -o $output_bigwig \$normalize -of bigwig --skipNAs ; if [ \$bai==1 ] ; then rm ${input_bam}.bai ; fi"
